price: «መጀመሪያይቱም ለኋለኛይቱ ለእናንተ በእኛ ላይ ምንም ብልጫ አልነበራችሁም» ትላለች፡፡ «ትሠሩትም በነበራችሁት ቅጣቱን ቅመሱ» (ይላቸዋል)፡፡
arabic: وَقَالَتۡ أُولَىٰهُمۡ لِأُخۡرَىٰهُمۡ فَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡنَا مِن فَضۡلٖ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālat ūlāhum li-ukh'rāhum famā kāna lakum ʿalaynā min faḍlin fadhūqū al-ʿadhāba bimā kuntum taksibūna
